meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Judith Reusswig Rob Manning John Patlan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1363.

td.p: Judith Reusswig, an elementary teacher from Bethesda, Maryland
Rob Manning, a computer systems consultant originally from San Francisco, California
John Patlan, a social worker from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,001)

tr.td: GEORGIA
SPORTS
INTERNATIONAL CUISINE
NAMES
FASHION HISTORY
APPROXIMATE WEIGHTS & MEASURES

(including 1 DD),
